function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of infection within the population","Impact":"Rapid spread and increase in the number of infected individuals","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict mitigation policies and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccine distribution technology","People":"General population","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"High stringency index impacting population behavior","Impact":"Social and economic burdens leading to non-compliance with mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Effective communication and support for affected individuals, targeted assistance programs","Technologies":"Community outreach platforms, data analytics for targeted assistance","People":"Affected individuals, businesses, and communities","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Testing capacity and accuracy of cumulative E and I variables","Impact":"Inaccurate data and underestimation of the infected population","Mitigation":"Investment in testing infrastructure and data validation techniques","Technologies":"Testing technology, data validation algorithms","People":"Healthcare workers, data analysts","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, data management agencies"}]}
